attributes.action: Open Nandos for take-away only during the whole isolation period.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to allow this as Nandos is extremely craves by 98% of the residents of London.
attributes.background: Allow Nandos to open their restaurants in London.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition, the Government has lifted some restrictions allowing more businesses to reopen. Which sites reopen is a decision for individual businesses.
